item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 8:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Gukesh becomes the youngest chess world champion in history (603 points | 275 comments)

3. Bitbanging 1D Reversible Automata (30 points | 1 comment)

21. Canada euthanasia now accounts for nearly one in 20 deaths (152 points | 193 comments)
22. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (950 points | 465 comments)

25. Mysterious New Jersey drone sightings prompt call for 'state of emergency' (415 points | 731 comments)
26. Microsoft Recall still storing credit card, social security numbers (67 points | 23 comments)
27. Parkinson's Law: It’s real, so use it (99 points | 86 comments)
28. The FDA Hasn't Inspected This Drug Factory After 7 Recalls for the Same Flaw (118 points | 56 comments)
29. Show HN: Credit reports about German companies (23 points | 9 comments)
30. A simple math error sparked a panic about black plastic kitchen utensils (91 points | 92 comments)
